data.title: This Place Sparkles
data.text:
I stopped here for lunch on my way home and was I ever surprised.  Being something of a food snob (not in the least!) I can proudly say I have had Taco Bell in at least 10 different states.  I have also visited Bell Gardens in CA where the idea was born and bought fresh veggies there.

This is far and away the cleanest, most attractive TB I have ever seen.  Every table was freshly bussed. The restrooms well stocked. A team member was washing the front door when I came in!

My order was taken by a most pleasant muchacha.  It was properly prepared and promptly delivered.  What more can you ask or expect?

data.title: Best Taco Bell in Miami....
data.text: This Taco Bell is always clean and on point. There are not many Taco Bell locations I would eat from but this place has a great staff and has actually been featured on the news for passing state inspections with a perfect score. You can see this from the moment you walk in the door because it's spotless.

data.title: Cashier was the sweetest
data.text: I was so suprised to find the order/cashier so helpful & friendly, When I got to the window it was a pleasure to see asmiling face, and helped me with y order. Food when I got home was perfect! ,Correcy order.lol And not allover the place. Thk U!

data.title: bom
data.text:
restaurante muito bom mais caro 
se esta pretendendo jantar no TACO BEL 
recomendo preparar o bolso literalmente caro

data.title: Infaltable, hay que conocerlo
data.text: Es un calsico, siempre encontrara uno cerca, de comidas rapidas ( muy picantes) y excelente atencion, Recuerde la bebida la paga una sola vez , luego siga consumiento ( no alcoholica)
